data.name: A YEAR OF SPRINGS
data.detailed_description:
New game by npckc!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1914740/A_HERO_AND_A_GARDEN/


About the Game

Three women, three stories, three springs.

Experience the stories of Haru, Erika, and Manami in A YEAR OF SPRINGS, a visual novel trilogy about a trio of friends navigating their feelings of love, connection, and just wanting to belong.

FEATURES

  • Three visual novels with multiple endings
  • An all-new epilogue exclusive to the trilogy collection
  • Soft and cute art with a relaxing original soundtrack
  • Music player, CG gallery, and other extras



In one night, hot springs, visit the hot springs with Haru, a young and anxious trans woman who just wants to enjoy herself on a trip with Manami but doesn't want to cause any trouble.



In last day of spring, start off the Reiwa era as Erika, a well-meaning ex-delinquent who runs into more issues than expected when trying to plan a spa day for Haru.



In spring leaves no flowers, help sheltered university student Manami think about what friendship and romance mean to her as she spends a day with Haru, Erika, and her boyfriend.

CONTENT WARNING

This trilogy discusses issues that people of different genders and sexualities may face, which is a topic that can be sensitive and personal.

data.short_description: Experience the stories of Haru, Erika, and Manami, a trio of friends navigating their feelings of love, connection, and just wanting to belong.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Korean, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Thai
data.reviews:
“I came to realize that [Haru's] situation is different from others. Within the law, the system, or the community, there was no place for her to be accepted. This is a game for people who have been denied of being themselves.”
AUTOMATON

“A Year of Springs is the heartfelt story of three young women in Japan, facing issues with love, friendship, and gender. This visual novel is cute yet compelling, and highly recommended.”
PureNintendo

“本作は3者の視点からジェンダーに関する悩みを描いた作品だが、生きづらさを感じる人ならば、すべての人が共感できるものなっているし、世界や人との信頼を取り戻すきっかけになるだろう。”
IGN Japan

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Additional Notes: Game is not notarized.

highlighted.name: THE WORLD CAN BE KIND TOO
